extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from ITLN215; ITLN415; LLCU215.

basic.description:
A study of Dante Alighieri¿s life and poetry, especially the Vita Nuova and the Divina Commedia.
NOTE    Taught in English together with LLCU 215/3.0. Students concentrating in Italian submit written assignments, tests and examinations in Italian. Normally they will read Italian texts in the original.
basic.subject: ITLN
basic.title: Dante
